security: Identifying individuals by name, passport number, and residence could compromise their privacy. Sharing specific operational codenames like 'RYBAT' and 'TYPIC' may reveal intelligence-gathering methods. Quoting directly: 'IDEN A: FERNANDO PALENZUKIA VAQUET...PASSPORT No. 45809...RESIDENT OF AVENIDA 35 No. 9809, MARIANAO, CUBA'.
summary: A cable identifies three individuals: Fernando Palenzukia Vaquet, Maria Francisca Crespo Falcon, and Howard Anderson.
summary_one_paragraph: This cable from Mexico City identifies three individuals: Fernando Palenzukia Vaquet, born in Cuba on November 9, 1903, residing at Avenida 35 No. 9809, Mariano, Cuba, and possessing passport No. 45809; Maria Francisca Crespo Falcon, born in Cuba on November 28, 1914, also residing at the same address with passport No. 28149; and Howard Anderson. The cable references previous communication DIR 86283 and uses codenames RYBAT and TYPIC.
title: Identification of Individuals in Mexico City
